page.title: 18Special Features (1)
page.content:
The{Plant Breeding Institute}has extensive fields beside the old A10 (now A1310) where test-growing is carried out. Some glasshouses have been brightly illuminated all day and night for 20 years as an experiment. They light up the night sky. The fields are divided into little squares of different crops, and are protected from the fumes from the M11 by a high fence.
Close to Addenbrookes Hospital is the{Parke-Davies Research Centre}which is very private. You have to talk to a receptionist through an intercom and the main doors are electronically locked.
